pullRequest.title: Fix BasicDigitalTwin and BasicRelationship to take mandatory parameters in constructor rather than setters
pullRequest.bodyText: Other model objects that are generated by autorest are configured to take mandatory parameters as constructor time arguments, so these two hand-written types should follow suit.

commit.message:
Fix BasicDigitalTwin and BasicRelationship to take mandatory parameters in constructor rather than setters

Other model objects that are generated by autorest are configured to take mandatory parameters as constructor time arguments, so these two hand-written types should follow suit.

nodes.bodyText: nit: the tabbing needs to be fixed here
